text: Shuntaro Furukawa (born in January 10, 1972, 古川 俊太郎) is a Japanese businessman, he is known for being the current CEO of Nintendo since June 28, 2018. he is the sixth president of Nintendo, succeeding the previous one, Tatsumi Kimishima, his vice-president is Shigeru Miyamoto. he is also said to be fluent in english == References == Category:businessmen Category:1972 births Category:Nintendo
title: Shuntaro Furukawa
